description: Numerator of 1/F1 + 1/F2 + 1/F3 + ... + 1/Fn where Fn is the n-th Fibonacci number (A000045).
links: Naim Tuglu, Can Kizilates, Seyhun Kesim, On the Harmonic and Hyperharmonic Fibonacci Numbers, arXiv:1505.04284 [math.NT], 2015 (see Table 1).
maple: BB:=n->sum(1/fibonacci(i), i=1..n): a:=n->floor(numer(BB(n))): seq(a(n), n=1..19); # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Mar 28 2007
mathematica: Table[ 1 / Fibonacci[n], {n, 1, 19}] // Accumulate // Numerator (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Mar 07 2013 *)
prog: (PARI) lista(nn) = s = 0; for (n=1, nn, s += 1/fibonacci(n); print1(numerator(s), ", ");); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Nov 28 2014
author: Avi Peretz (njk(AT)netvision.net.il), Jan 22 2001
extensions: Offset changed to 1 by _Michel Marcus_, Nov 28 2014
